author: Ed Baines
method: Turn the oven to the highest setting and smear butter over two small ovenproof dishes. Cover with a combination of ham, mushrooms and spinach, if liked. Crack a couple of eggs over the top, followed by grated cheese, salt and pepper.  Cook for approximately 10 minutes.
ingredients: 35g/1Â¼oz butter,  4 eggs,  2 handfuls of grated cheese,  salt and pepper,  additions: ham or mushrooms cooked, drained spinach (optional)
